featured_reviews.review_id:
After being a customer of their village location for well over a decade & now UES location for about 3 years- I can honestly say I will never shop here again.

I've worked in customer service for over 20 years and I've always gone out of my way to try to be helpful to others. The one time I go in to try to get something resolved & all they could do is send me away with a duplicate copy of my receipt and told to take it up with the manufacturer.

It's experiences like these that make me understand why brick and mortar business is dead and people turn to the Internet for their shopping.

shame on you you've lost a customer.

yaziklar olsun, bir musteriyi kaybettiniz.

featured_question.question:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Lutfen Romantic Depot'un Flatbush Bulvari'nda yeni bir magaza actigini, Mill Basin'de yasadigimizi ve normalde Queens magazasina veya Fulton Street Brooklyn magazasina gidecegimizi dogrulayin. Eger bu dogruysa, gidecegim yer burasi olacak. Lutfen onaylar misiniz?

(Orijinal)
Please confirm that Romantic Depot opened a new store on Flatbush Avenue,  We live in Mill Basin and would normally go to their Queens store or the Fulton Street Brooklyn store. If its true, this will be my go to spot, Please confirm?
featured_question.answer:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Evet her gun 12:00-22:00 Paz - Persembe ve 12:00-12:00 Cuma ve Cumartesi 12:00'ye kadar acik, Kings Plaza Mall'a 5 dakika ve Barclays Center'a 0 dakika uzaklikta bulunuyorlar. Disarida harika bir park yeri var ve Flatbush boyunca gun boyu otobusler geciyor. Magaza, Fulton caddesindeki Brooklyn Romantik Depot magazasindan daha kucuk gorunuyor cunku disaridaki vitrin dar, ancak magaza aslinda 906 Fulton Caddesi'nden cok daha buyuk. Fiyatlarin iyi oldugunu ve hizmetin bilgili ve eglenceli oldugunu kontrol etmek isteyebilirsiniz. Ciftler, arkadaslar ve bekarlar icin iyi.

(Orijinal)
Yes open everyday 12pm-10pm Sun - Thursday and 12pm -12am Friday and Saturday until 12am, They are located 5 minutes from the Kings Plaza Mall and 0 minutes from the Barclays Center. There is great parking outside and buses run along Flatbush all day. The store seems smaller than the Romantic Depot Brooklyn on Fulton street store because the outside storefront is narrow, but the store is actually much bigger than 906 Fulton Street. You might want to check this place out the prices were good and service was knowledgeable and fun. Good for couples, friends and singles.

places.plus_code: Q246+37 New York, Amerika Birlesik Devletleri

featured_reviews.review_id:
Looks small from the outside but has a MASSIVE SELECTION of really good, reasonably priced, name brand adult novelties and entertainment options.

The staff have the tendency to stare scrutinisingly and make you feel rushed to pick something, buy, and leave when you're making notes in your head and deciding which novelty or video or piece of apparel you're going to buy. They're not crowded in most cases and aren't constantly busy, yet there's a subtle unfriendly tension in the air that even if you just entered the store, all the staff are already thinking "You're taking way too long. Hurry up!". There's no reason to rush, it's a big store and on most of the times I've been there, there have been no more than 6, single, masked, quiet people, spread out from front to back. The place is silent other than the ambient sounds of A/C and a radio playing pop songs from the late 2000's to around 2015 or 2016, though I've recognised disco and mild EDM.

And no matter how long you've been walking around, figuring out what you're gonna spend at least $30 to $100 on average, the staff who float around giving the previously mentioned "Pick-Pay-Get Out" aura are following you around like a creepy ex ducking around corners to maintain constant visual. It's not a good sign when your customers feel like they're under suspicion of shoplifting the moment you turn around to look at the other side of the isle and accidentally lock eyes for a split second with an intimidating meatball watching you like a hawk does it's dinner. I understand your concern.. I'm a young 20-something male who doesn't exactly dress like the typical guy* (*I'm very emo, and a femboy... I stand out), and have a poker-face like a immaculate cinderblock wall. But even if you're trying to make sure I'm not a clepto, at least show some discretion. (I don't touch anything unless it's coming up to the register with me. If I want to read up about it I look it up on duck duck go so I don't even have to be seen holding it. I make a concerted effort to be quiet, respectful, and make it well known that I'm not a shoplifter.) And even that considered, this one guy who works there is always breathing down my neck, and making disgusted faces at me like he disapproves of my appearance and is silently judging me for the things I'm buying... Why is it his business what I'm buying from the store he works for? If he's standing 2 feet behind me, eyes locked on me with a menacing grimace, I have really bad anxiety, I could leave and take my business elsewhere.

But despite my complaints, I'm really fond of the store, the selection, the competitive pricing and the respectful, and quiet. Yet helpful fellow patrons there. I will continue to shop there into the future whether or not this is received or seen by management and they decide to tell their security to be less needlessly aggressive and hostile to their customers. Say something if someone is acting weirdly and avoiding cameras and products are being capered by untrustworthy people, rather than grunting at someone for taking their wallet out to count their money, or menacing people who can't decide and aren't touching your stuff... Please.

But still 4 stars is still my rating.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Disaridan kucuk gorunuyor ama gercekten iyi, makul fiyatli, markali yetiskinlere yonelik yenilikler ve eglence seceneklerinden olusan MUHTESEM BIR SECIME sahip.

Siz kafanizda notlar alirken ve hangi yeniligi, videoyu veya kiyafet parcasini satin alacaginiza karar verirken, personelin dikkatle bakma ve bir seyi secmek, satin almak ve ayrilmak icin acele ettiginizi hissettirme egilimi vardir. Cogu durumda kalabalik degiller ve surekli mesgul degiller, ancak havada hafif, dusmanca bir gerilim var; magazaya yeni girmis olsaniz bile, tum personel zaten "Cok uzun suruyorsunuz. Acele edin" diye dusunuyor. !". Acele etmeye gerek yok, burasi buyuk bir magaza ve oraya gittigim cogu zaman, onden arkaya dagilmis, tek basina, maskeli, sessiz insanlar 6'dan fazla olmuyordu. Ortamdaki klima sesleri ve 2000'li yillarin sonlarindan 2015 veya 2016'ya kadar pop sarkilari calan radyo disinda mekan sessiz, ancak disko ve hafif EDM'yi de fark ettim.

Ve ne kadar suredir ortalikta dolasip ortalama en az 30 ila 100 dolar arasi harcayacaginizi hesaplayarak dolassaniz da, daha once bahsedilen "Sec-Ode-Cik" aurasini vererek etrafta dolasan personel sizi takip ediyor. Surekli gorselligi korumak icin koselerden kacan tuyler urpertici bir eski sevgili gibi. Musterilerinizin, adanin diger tarafina bakmak icin arkanizi dondugunuzde ve sizi bir sahin gibi izleyen korkutucu bir kofteyle kazara bir anligina gozlerini kilitlediginiz anda, kendilerini bir hirsizlik suphesi altinda hissetmeleri iyi bir isaret degildir. aksam yemegi. Endisenizi anliyorum.. Ben tam olarak tipik bir erkek gibi giyinmeyen 20'li yaslarinda genc bir erkegim* (*Cok duygusalim ve femboyum... Goze carpiyorum) ve poker oynuyorum... tertemiz bir kul blok duvari gibi yuz. Ama benim klepto olmadigimdan emin olmaya calissan bile en azindan biraz sagduyulu ol. (Kasaya gelmedikce hicbir seye dokunmuyorum. Bu konuda bir seyler okumak istersem Duck Duck Go'ya bakarim, boylece onu tutarken gorulmeme bile gerek kalmaz. Uyumlu bir sekilde yaparim. sessiz, saygili olma ve hirsiz olmadigimi herkesin bilmesini saglama cabasi.) Ve buna ragmen, orada calisan bu adam her zaman ensemden nefes aliyor ve sanki davranisimi onaylamiyormus gibi bana tiksinti dolu yuz ifadeleri kullaniyor. gorunusum ve aldigim seyler yuzunden sessizce beni yargiliyor... Calistigi magazadan satin aldigim seyler neden onu ilgilendiriyor? Eger 2 adim arkamda duruyorsa, tehditkar bir yuz burusturmayla gozleri bana kilitlenmisse, gercekten kotu bir endisem var, gidip isimi baska bir yere goturebilirim.

Ancak sikayetlerime ragmen magazayi, secimi, rekabetci fiyatlandirmayi, saygili ve sessizligi gercekten cok seviyorum. Yine de yardimsever dost patronlar var. Bunun yonetim tarafindan alinip alinmamasina veya gorulmesine bakilmaksizin gelecekte orada alisveris yapmaya devam edecegim ve guvenliklerine musterilerine karsi daha az gereksiz saldirgan ve dusmanca davranmalarini soylemeye karar verdiler. Birisi garip davraniyorsa ve kameralardan ve urunlerden kaciniyorsa, guvenilmez insanlar tarafindan caliniyorsa, birine parasini saymak icin cuzdanini cikardigi icin homurdanmak veya karar veremeyen ve esyalariniza dokunmayan insanlari tehdit etmek yerine bir seyler soyleyin. .. Lutfen.

Ama yine de 4 yildiz hala benim puanim.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I will start off by saying that except for the very inappropriate comments made by one of the employees, the rest of the staff was kind and helpful. I don't want to be unfair with my rating since it was just one awful employee and the store itself was great with lots of options, hence why I'm not leaving a one star review even though it's tempting considering how awful I feel currently due to the comment from said employee. I just want to highlight and hopefully the employee can learn how harmful their words are and maybe not jump on people for no reason.

I had picked up a blouse to show my friends when out of nowhere an older employee came up behind me and proceeded to go on about how I had picked up the wrong size (mind you how could he know if it was my size or if it was even for me considering all I did was pick the shirt up and show it to my friend). The employee then proceeded to talk to me like I was stupid and was unnecessarily mean, going on about "Did you even check the size at all? That's not your size, that's a 2xl and the size for you is all the way down there." All I did was pick up a shirt to show my friend and then a second later I'm being yelled at for not picking my own size? I hadn't check the size as I was just looking at the shirt itself since it had caught my eye, I hadn't asked to try it on or anything. Simply looking and showing a friend. I understand the concern of someone buying something that's not their size and taking away from someone else who needs it but I just picked it up to show my friends. I have been plus size for the majority of my life so I understand how hard it is to find cool clothes like this in a wide size range but as someone who has recently lost said weight due to an illness it really wasn't great having my size highlighted to the whole store and being made out to be stupid and a bad person for simply picking up a shirt and being reminded of something out of my control. It really turned me away from purchasing anything or stopping back in. The people I was with couldn't believe how unnecessarily rude the interaction was considering the rest of the staff was so kind. It's like the employee wanted to go out of his way to be rude. Maybe think next time how to better frame your words without being so unkind as you never know what someone is going through.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Calisanlardan birinin yaptigi cok uygunsuz yorumlar disinda, personelin geri kalaninin nazik ve yardimsever oldugunu soyleyerek baslayacagim. Sadece berbat bir calisan oldugu ve magazanin kendisi de bircok secenekle harikaydi, bu yuzden su anda ne kadar berbat hissettigimi goz onunde bulundurarak cazip olmasina ragmen neden tek yildizli bir inceleme birakmiyorum? soz konusu calisanin yorumu nedeniyle. Sadece vurgulamak istiyorum ve umarim calisan, sozlerinin ne kadar zararli oldugunu ogrenebilir ve belki de sebepsiz yere insanlarin uzerine atlamaz.

Arkadaslarima gostermek icin bir bluz almistim ki, birdenbire yasli bir calisan arkamdan geldi ve nasil yanlis beden aldigimi anlatmaya basladi (akillica, benim bedenim olup olmadigini nasil bilebilirdi) Yaptigim tek seyin gomlegi alip arkadasima gostermek oldugu dusunulurse bu benim icin bile gecerliydi). Daha sonra calisan benimle aptalmisim ve gereksiz derecede kaba davranmisim gibi konusmaya basladi ve soyle devam etti: "Bedenini hic kontrol ettin mi? Bu sizin bedeniniz degil, bu 2xl ve sizin bedeniniz de tam burada." Tek yaptigim arkadasima gostermek icin bir gomlek almakti ve bir saniye sonra kendi bedenimi secmedigim icin bana bagiriliyor muydu? Gozume carptigi icin sadece gomlegin kendisine baktigim icin bedenini kontrol etmemistim, denemek falan istememistim. Sadece bir arkadasiniza bakip gostermeniz yeterli. Birinin kendisine ait olmayan bir seyi alip ihtiyaci olan birinden almasi endisesini anliyorum ama onu arkadaslarima gostermek icin aldim. Hayatimin cogunda buyuk beden giydim, bu yuzden genis beden araliginda boyle havali kiyafetler bulmanin ne kadar zor oldugunu anliyorum ama yakin zamanda bir hastalik nedeniyle kilo vermis biri olarak bu elbiseye sahip olmanin gercekten harika olmadigini soyledi. boyutu tum magazaya vurgulaniyor ve sadece bir gomlegi alip kontrolum disinda bir sey hatirlatildigi icin aptal ve kotu bir insan olarak gosteriliyor. Bu beni gercekten bir sey satin almaktan ya da tekrar gelmekten uzaklastirdi. Birlikte oldugum insanlar, personelin geri kalaninin bu kadar nazik oldugunu dusunursek etkilesimin ne kadar gereksiz derecede kaba olduguna inanamadilar. Sanki calisan kaba davranmak icin elinden geleni yapmak istiyormus gibi. Belki bir dahaki sefere birisinin neler yasadigini asla bilemeyeceginiz kadar kaba olmadan kelimelerinizi nasil daha iyi cerceveleyeceginizi dusunun.

featured_reviews.review_id: The old lady at the register was completely rude. I went there for the first time with a friend and I am a complete beginner. I ended up opening a box to a vibrator that just needed to be folded open with no tape or anything to break off. featured_reviews.review_id:
This was the first time coming to a store like this and believe me when I say that I was nervous beyond belief. The staff was super accommodating and friendly, I had actually bumped into the owner and he personally helped me. Overall, everyone was super helpful and they really helped me find the right products.

As for the store itself, I found everything super well organized and clean.  Their selection is pretty wide and I definitely had way too many options to choose from but it's definitely a good problem to have. I'd say it was 10/10 and I will definitely be back.

featured_reviews.review_id: If you are looking for the goods, this is THE place I'm telling you. I have previously been to other stores as well but they really got the most variety and quality. I was intrigued by the variety of products I have only seen in foreign countries and online stores in here so I made conversations with the owner and he was very knowledgeable in this area and also found out they have numerous locations throughout the city and gets products from all over the world. They actually participate in renowned product shows across the country (which is one of the reason they are able to get the quality products). Would definitely recommend this store for any first timers AND regulars. You won't regret it.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Marcos,

Thank you for sharing your feedback.

After further reviewing the picture you've uploaded, it appears that you may have mistaken us for a different adult store in the area. The picture provided appears to have toy testers displayed with hearts and other red props, however, all our toy testers are displayed in black shelves protected behind an acrylic screen door.

We would sincerely appreciate it if you could check again to see which store it was exactly. We are located between a tattoo store and a small liquor store. If you still believe that it is us, please reach out to us via email <info@london-boutique.com>.

We hope that you will understand.

Thank you

Best,

The London Team
featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Siyah sacli bayan orada calisirken dukkan daha iyiydi. Incelemelerin cogunun iceriden incelemeler oldugunu anliyorum. Ngl, personel cok bilgili gorunuyor ama sattiklari urunler cogu zaman kusurlu.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text:
Merhaba Marcos,

Geri bildiriminizi paylastiginiz icin tesekkur ederiz.

Yuklediginiz resmi daha detayli inceledikten sonra, bizi bolgedeki farkli bir yetiskin magazasiyla karistirmis olabileceginiz anlasiliyor. Saglanan resimde oyuncak test cihazlarinin kalpler ve diger kirmizi aksesuarlarla sergilendigi goruluyor ancak tum oyuncak test cihazlarimiz akrilik bir ekran kapinin arkasinda korunan siyah raflarda sergileniyor.

Tam olarak hangi magaza oldugunu gormek icin tekrar kontrol ederseniz cok seviniriz. Bir dovme magazasi ile kucuk bir icki dukkaninin arasinda bulunuyoruz. Eger hala biz oldugumuza inaniyorsaniz, lutfen <info@london-boutique.com> e-postasi yoluyla bize ulasin.

Anlayacaginizi umuyoruz.

Tesekkur ederim

En iyi,

Londra Takimi

I was initially nervous about coming, but as soon as I entered I was greeted with a warm welcome. The selection was endless, so I asked for the best selling products and I could not be more satisfied! I've checked out a number of other amazon products, but nothing beats the personalized experience this store has to offer.

I don't usually write reviews, but I had to for the amazing customer experience. I would highly recommend this establishment to anyone, whether you're a first timer or experienced.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Good dungeon space in a city where that's surprisingly difficult. I appreciate them being there for the community. Huge library of implements included with the room make it perfect for people travelling. Not a concern for me, but I appreciate them putting extra effort (only one couple in the hallway at a time, etc) into discretion for those that need it.

Note though that: 1) the bathroom is shared between all rooms so if you can plan to change in your room, that's better, I wouldn't plan to shower. 2) the actual entrance location is proximate but isn't this location, check your confirmation email carefully. It is close enough to the Museum of Sex (which has a great store for last minute needs) that you can do that first.
